languages.text: {n}Стракс не сдерживает смешок.{/n} "Кажется, вас оскорбил намек, что вы можете упасть в обморок? Что ж, признаю — разница в поведении есть, и вы ее сейчас наглядно закрепили".
{n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."
languages.original_text: {n}Стракс не сдерживает смешок.{/n} "Кажется, вас оскорбил намек, что вы можете упасть в обморок? Что ж, признаю — разница в поведении есть, и вы ее сейчас наглядно закрепили".

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs huffs a laugh.{/n} "You seem to be offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells? Well— I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."

languages.text: {n}Strachs entfährt ein Lachen.{/n} "Ihr scheint Euch an der Unterstellung zu stören, wonach Ihr anfällig für schwächende Zauber seid? Nun ... Ich gebe zu, es gibt einen Unterschied, und ihr habt gerade allen die Augen dafür geöffnet."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs entfährt ein Lachen.{/n} "Ihr scheint Euch an der Unterstellung zu stören, wonach Ihr anfällig für schwächende Zauber seid? Nun ... Ich gebe zu, es gibt einen Unterschied, und ihr habt gerade allen die Augen dafür geöffnet."

languages.text: {n}Strachs lâche un ricanement.{/n} « Prendriez-vous ombrage à l'insinuation que vous êtes {mf|sujet|sujette} à des évanouissements ? Ma foi... Je reconnais qu'il y a une différence, et vous l'avez rendue évidente aux yeux de tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs lâche un ricanement.{/n} « Prendriez-vous ombrage à l'insinuation que vous êtes {mf|sujet|sujette} à des évanouissements ? Ma foi... Je reconnais qu'il y a une différence, et vous l'avez rendue évidente aux yeux de tous. »

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯笑了一声。{/n}“这段视讯记录暗示你被巫术弄晕了，而你好像感到相当冒犯。嗯……我得承认，这一点确实很可疑，而且你提出的疑点，所有人都注意到了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯笑了一声。{/n}“这段视讯记录暗示你被巫术弄晕了，而你好像感到相当冒犯。嗯……我得承认，这一点确实很可疑，而且你提出的疑点，所有人都注意到了。”

languages.text: {n}Strachs suelta una carcajada.{/n} «Parece que la idea de que tiene tendencia a desmayarse le resulta ofensiva. Bueno... admito que hay una diferencia y la ha dejado clara».
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs suelta una carcajada.{/n} «Parece que la idea de que tiene tendencia a desmayarse le resulta ofensiva. Bueno... admito que hay una diferencia y la ha dejado clara».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスは鼻で笑った。{/n}「失神しやすいというほのめかしに腹を立てているようですね。ふむ、これは実に…奇妙だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs a laugh.{/n} "You seem to be offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells? Well, it is quite... strange."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスは鼻で笑った。{/n}「失神しやすいというほのめかしに腹を立てているようですね。ふむ、これは実に…奇妙だ」

languages.text: {n}Strachs gülüyor.{/n} "Bayılmaya meyilli oluşunun ima edilmesi bile seni gücendirmeye yetti. Kabul etmeliyim... Herkesin anlayacağı şekilde ortaya koyduğun üzere aynı şey değil tabii ki."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs huffs out a laugh.{/n} "You seem offended by the insinuation that you are prone to fainting spells. Well... I admit, there is a difference, and you have just made it plain for all to see."
